item.description:
Revel in the first night of the AIA National Convention in Boston on May 15 with a smorgasbord of architecturally themed movies, an open bar and building tours by Arrowstreet. Head to the Artists for Humanity EpiCenter (100 West Second St. near the Red Line's Broadway Station), the only Platinum LEED-certified building in Boston, from 9:00 pm to midnight for this $50 networking event.

This event is sponsored by Autodesk.

**Please note, you MUST purchase tickets at http://www.architects... to RSVP! You do not have to be a BSA/AIA member or AIA Convention attendee to come.**
item.why: Networking, an awesome green, Arrowstreet-designed building, movies, young professionals, an open bar ... what more could you ask for?
item.name: Late Nite Movies at the EpiCenter
